title: Here comes the Bride and the Mistress
itunes:title: Here comes the Bride and the Mistress
description:
Thursday 7/26 Today on the show after reporting a video of a angry driver following a black man home and using the N word repeatedly to him, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners would do if someone followed them home. Moreover, Charlamagne gave a double Donkey with a couple getting married, and the mistress was even invited, talk about awkward. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 7/26 Today on the show after reporting a video of a angry driver following a black man home and using the N word repeatedly to him, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners would do if someone followed them home. Moreover, Charlamagne gave a double Donkey with a couple getting married, and the mistress was even invited, talk about awkward. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
